title: cast
desc: Convert the base datatype of a data structure or datatype from one base type to another (i.e. [int32,int32] to [flat64,float64]), it is useful to note that maps of arrays are allowed and handle by the specification.

input.name: toType
input.description: String depicting which datatype to cast to.  Allowed:int64,float64,string,int32,float32,boolean
